text: Fanta Idrissa Koné (born 5 May 1995) is a Malian football referee. She was a referee at 2023 FIFA Women's World Cup. == Career == Since 2014, she has been on the list of international football referees in FIFA. In April 2021, she participated in a CAF Champions League match. Koné was an assistant referee during the 2016 U-17 World Cup in Jordan, the 2017 Algarve Cup, the 2018 U-17 World Cup in Uruguay, and the 2022 U-20 World Cup in Costa Rica. She was an assistant to Salima Mukansanga, with Mimisen Iyorhe, during the 2022 Africa Cup of Nations in Morocco. She refereed the final between Morocco and South Africa. == References == Category:1995 births Category:Association football referees Category:Malian people Category:Living people
title: Fanta Kone
